## Anonymization Check

- [ ] No real IPs (only `10.0.x.x`, `127.0.0.1`, or public DNS like `1.1.1.1`)
- [ ] No real hostnames, domains, or organization names
- [ ] No credentials, tokens, API keys, or credential store paths
- [ ] No specific hardware model numbers that identify real equipment
- [ ] No real person names, usernames, or email addresses
- [ ] CI content-safety check passes
